          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Sales Promotion</string>
            <string language="en">Sales Promotion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkaufsförderung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Promotion des ventes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Promotion De Vendas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Promozione Di Vendite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προώθηση πωλήσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Promoción De Ventas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Sales Promotion kan rikta sig såväl mot konsumenten som mot handeln. Ofta lägger man även till ett tredje led i definitionen; den egna säljkåren.Modul 2 - Marknad.Ingår i FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
            <string language="en">Sales Promotion can aim itself as well against the consumer that against the trade. Often puts one also to a third stage in the definition; the own säljkåren.

Module 2 - market.

Is included in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">ekonomi</string>
            <string language="sv">reklam</string>
            <string language="sv">konsument</string>
            <string language="sv">handel</string>
            <string language="sv">den egna säljkåren</string>
            <string language="sv">säljkår</string>
            <string language="sv">kund</string>
            <string language="sv">SP-kampanj</string>
            <string language="sv">SP-aktivitet</string>
            <string language="sv">kund</string>
            <string language="sv">produkt</string>
            <string language="sv">vara</string>
            <string language="sv">tjänst</string>
            <string language="sv">marknadskommunikation</string>
            <string language="sv">markandsföring</string>
            <string language="en">economy</string>
            <string language="en">publicity</string>
            <string language="en">consumer</string>
            <string language="en">trade</string>
            <string language="en">the own säljkåren</string>
            <string language="en">säljkår</string>
            <string language="en">customer</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish Testing and Research Institute campaign</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish Testing and Research Institute activity</string>
            <string language="en">customer</string>
            <string language="en">product</string>
            <string language="en">last</string>
            <string language="en">service</string>
            <string language="en">marknadskommunikation</string>
            <string language="en">markandsföring</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkaufsförderung kann gegen den Verbraucher 
außerdem sich zielen, der gegen den Handel. Setzt häufig ein 
auch zu einem dritten Stadium in die Definition; 
säljkåren.Module 2 besitzen - market.Is eingeschlossen in 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La promotion des ventes peut se viser aussi bien 
contre le consommateur qui contre le commerce. Met souvent un 
également à une troisième étape dans la définition ; 
posséder säljkåren.Module 2 - market.Is inclus dans 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O promotion de vendas pode apontar-se também de 
encontro ao consumidor que de encontro ao comércio. Põe 
frequentemente um também a um terceiro estágio na definição; 
para possuir säljkåren.Module 2 - market.Is incluído em 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La promozione di vendite può mirarsi pure contro
il consumatore che contro il commercio. Mette spesso uno 
egualmente ad una terza fase nella definizione; possedere 
säljkåren.Module 2 - market.Is incluso in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η προώθηση πωλήσεων μπορεί να στοχευθεί επίσης 
ενάντια στον καταναλωτή που ενάντια στο εμπόριο. Συχνά 
βάζει το ένα επίσης σε ένα τρίτο στάδιο στον καθορισμό  η
sδljkεren. ενότητα 2 - η αγορά συμπεριλαμβάνεται σε 
FφretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La promoción de ventas puede apuntarse también 
contra el consumidor que contra el comercio. Pone a menudo uno 
también a una tercera etapa en la definición; poseer 
säljkåren.Module 2 - market.Is incluido en FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
